project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project structure and install necessary libraries
Implement function to fetch weather data from public API
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and conditions
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather data fetching and parsing functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
